description: Adds a resouce policy to control access to a model group. For information about resoure policies, see Identity-based policies and resource-based policies in the Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management User Guide..

parameters.name: ModelPackageGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the model group to add a resource policy to.

parameters.name: ResourcePolicy
parameters.description: The resource policy for the model group.

nested_items.name: ModelPackageGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model package group.
